tool_description: Get whois information about any .pk domain
name: PK Domain Information
title: PK Domain Information

api_list.name: Lookup .pk domain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pk-domain-information1.p.rapidapi.com/pknic/lookup/google.com.pk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pk-domain-information1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pk-domain-information1.p.rapidapi.com/pknic/lookup/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pk-domain-information1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
